title: GRAPENT Pull On Jeans for Women High Waisted Skinny Capri Pants Trendy Stretch Denim Cropped Jeans Crop Jeggings Capris
description: Unrolled capri jeans INSEAM: 26 inches; elastic high waist style of womens capris for summer jeans provides a comfortable and flexible fit around the waist, allowing for ease of movement and accommodating different body shapes and sizes

Our denim capris for women casual summer with five functional pockets provide ample storage space for carrying essentials such as keys, phone, wallet, and other small items; this can be particularly convenient when you don't want to carry a bag or purse

Pull on closure of womens jeans high waisted eliminates the need for buttons, zippers, or other traditional closures, making them easy to slip on and off; this is particularly convenient for individuals who prefer a quick and fantastic dressing experience

The skinny leg cut of womens capri pants accentuates the shape of your legs, creating a slimming and elongating effect; they can make your legs appear longer and provide a more streamlined silhouette; made of stretchy, soft, and breathable denim fabric

GRAPENT capri pants run true to standard US sizes; size Small fits size 4 to size 6, size Medium fits size 8 to size 10, size Large fits size 12 to size 14, size X-Large fits size 16 to size 18, size XX-Large fits size 20 to size 22
